name: Hola - Customer Contact App
whatItIs: A shopify app that let's merchants manually contact abandoned carts and COD customers
highlights: Working with a partner for the second time after Super DMs
It will help merchants message, whatsapp, call for order confirmations, abandoned-carts or review requests.

name: Smart Quick Look
whatItIs: A shopify app that adds a simple carousel to your shopify site
highlights: Trying to increase downloads of this one

name: Pop Stor
whatItIs: A shopify app that lets you create a e-commerce version of LinkTree

name: Tiny Tea Kettle
highlights: Nothing to add as of now. Dad got pretty excited about this one though.

name: SuperDMs
whatItIs: Tool to automate stuff on twitter
highlights: First team project too, made good friends :)
Proper SaaS tool where I wrote code alongside an experienced dev, so I am proud of this one

name: Better Product Manager
whatItIs: Initially created to fight my own imposter syndrome. Better Product Manager has been featured on Product Hunt and gets 1000+ visitors each month
highlights: Loved working on this one, was my first project which got over a 5000 views
Finalist for 'Side-project product of the year' at Product Hunt.

name: How many BMWs
whatItIs: Created a fun application to show the trend of rising tech salaries in India, using a BMW bikes.
highlights: #5 product of the day at Product Hunt
A few of the people I follow on twitter retweeted this, so that made my day :)

name: Particypants
whatItIs: Slack application that helps teams take meeting notes.
highlights: First tech intensive product, played with Slack APIs and learned a lot about them in the process
Conducted usability tests on the MVP with ~10 teams, the product was not sticky enough so like a good product manager, decided to kill it :(
